name: Caper Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups packed fresh', 'name': 'basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1/3', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'green onions'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh dill'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'capers'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '1 1/2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'lemon zest'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'smashed garlic'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'black pepper'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Process basil, Parmesan, oil, pine nuts, green onions, dill, capers, juice, zest, garlic, salt, and pepper in a food processor until nearly smooth.. Chill in an airtight container up to 1 week; freeze up to 3 months.

name: Yummy Vegan Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '⅔', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'nutritional yeast'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: Place pine nuts in a skillet over medium heat; cook, stirring or shaking the pan often, until lightly toasted.. Place toasted pine nuts, olive oil, garlic, nutritional yeast, and basil in a food processor; blend until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Parmesan Pesto Roasted Cauliflower
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'head', 'name': 'cauliflower'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'salt and freshly ground pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pesto'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.. In a large bowl, toss the cauliflower florets with olive oil, salt, and pepper until evenly coated. Spread cauliflower evenly in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet. Set the bowl aside.. Roast in the preheated oven until golden and crispy on the edges, 25 to 30 minutes, turning halfway through cooking time.. Transfer hot cauliflower back to the bowl and toss with pesto and Parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.

name: Cannellini Bean Salad with Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'sourdough or French bread'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'red bell pepper -'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'red onion'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'zucchini'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'lemon, halved'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'head', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh parsley leaves'}, {'quantity': '2/3', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'walnuts'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'name': 'cannellini beans, drained and rinsed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cherry or grape tomatoes, halved'}
steps: Preheat an outdoor grill to medium heat (350 to 375 degrees F (175 to 190 degrees C)). Brush bread slices generously with 2 tablespoons oil. Oil grill grates. Arrange bread slices, bell pepper, onion, zucchini, lemon, and garlic, cut sides down, on grill grate over direct heat; cover grill.. Grill bread, turning halfway through, until toasted, about 4 minutes. Grill lemon and garlic until cut sides are lightly charred, 4 to 6 minutes. Grill zucchini, bell pepper, and onion, turning halfway through, until tender and lightly charred, 5 to 6 minutes for zucchini and 8 to 10 minutes for pepper and onion.. When cool enough to handle, squeeze cloves from garlic halves. Rub a few garlic cloves over both sides of toast. Reserve about 3 cloves garlic for the pesto (save remaining garlic for another use). Cut or tear toast into bite-size pieces.. For pesto, pulse parsley, walnuts, Parmesan cheese, salt, reserved 3 cloves garlic, and juice of grilled lemon in a food processor or blender until chopped. With machine running, pour in remaining 1/2 cup oil in a thin stream until mixture is smooth.. Cut bell pepper, onion, and zucchini into bite-sized pieces; add to a large bowl, along with croutons, cannellini beans, and tomatoes. Toss to combine. Arrange salad on a serving platter. Drizzle with pesto; toss to coat before serving.

name: Spinach Basil Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'baby spinach leaves'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'toasted pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil, divided'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, peeled and quartered'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'kosher salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'lemon zest'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}
steps: Place spinach, basil, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, 2 tablespoons olive oil, garlic, lemon juice, salt, lemon zest, and pepper into a food processor; blend until nearly smooth, scraping the sides of the bowl with a spatula as necessary.. Drizzle remaining olive oil into the mixture while processing until smooth.. Enjoy!

name: Pesto Sauce
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'chopped walnuts'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, peeled'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Blend together basil leaves, nuts, garlic, and cheese in a food processor until finely chopped.. Pour in oil slowly with the processor running. Season with salt and pepper.. Season with salt and pepper.. Enjoy!

name: Pesto Alfredo Sauce
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'half-and-half'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'prepared pesto'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}
steps: Combine half-and-half, pesto, butter, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a skillet over medium-low heat. Cook and stir until hot, about 8 minutes.

name: Garlic Scape Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'garlic scapes, cut into 2-inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Blend garlic scapes, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, lemon juice, and pepper together in a food processor until smooth.

name: Basil Cream Sauce
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pint', 'name': 'light cream'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Combine basil and garlic in a food processor.. Pour oil in slowly, with the processor running, until mixture begins to emulsify, about 40 seconds. Add Parmesan, pine nuts, salt, and pepper; blend for 1 minute.. Bring cream to a simmer in a saucepan over low heat.. Pour 1/2 of the hot cream into the food processor, and pulse for 20 seconds until incorporated with basil mixture.. Transfer basil-cream mixture to the saucepan. Stir with cream until well blended, then simmer until thickened, about 5 minutes.

name: Proper Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, peeled'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'kosher salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large bunch', 'name': 'fresh basil (about 4 to 5 ounces)'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'mild extra-virgin olive oil'}
steps: Crush garlic and pinch of kosher salt in a mortar with the pestle until garlic is mashed and paste-like, 1 or 2 minutes. Add basil in 3 or 4 additions, crushing and pounding down the leaves until they form a fairly fine paste, about 8 minutes or more depending on size of leaves and thickness of stems. Add and pound in pine nuts.. Transfer a handful of grated cheese to mortar and pound into the sauce. Add another handful of cheese and incorporate into the mixture. Continue adding cheese a handful at a time until completely incorporated, about 5 minutes.. Drizzle in olive oil 1 tablespoon at a time, pounding it into the sauce. When all the olive oil has been added and emulsified into the mixture, transfer pesto to a bowl and drizzle the surface with olive oil.

name: Basil Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'packed fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '⅔', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pine nuts (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Combine basil, cheese, and olive oil in a food processor. Pulse to combine. Add pine nuts, garlic, salt, and pepper. Pulse until mixture is smooth and blended.. Pour mixture onto a large sheet of plastic wrap; roll into a tube shape and seal. Store in the refrigerator until needed.

name: Pesto Genovese (Authentic Italian Basil Pesto)
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'grated pecorino Romano cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}
steps: Crush garlic using a mortar and pestle. Add pine nuts; crush with the garlic. Add basil leaves gradually, making circular movements with the pestle, until a smooth paste forms.. Mix Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese and pecorino Romano cheese using a wooden spoon. Stir in olive oil until pesto is blended.

name: Basil Pecan Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'pecans'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'kosher salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Blend the basil, pecans, garlic, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, salt, and pepper together in a food processor until the mixture becomes a slightly chunky paste.

name: Cashew Basil Pesto

steps: Place basil, Parmesan cheese, cashews, and garlic, in the bowl of a food processor or blender. Pour in olive oil and lemon juice. Blend until a smooth paste.

name: Sun-Dried Tomato Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'sun-dried tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped onion'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh basil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped garlic'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'crushed tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'balsamic vinegar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'red wine'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'tomato paste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}
steps: Place sun-dried tomatoes in a bowl and cover with warm water for 5 minutes, or until tender.. Place sun-dried tomatoes, pine nuts, onion, basil, parsley, and garlic in a food processor or blender; process until well blended. Add crushed tomatoes, vinegar, red wine, and tomato paste; blend to desired consistency. Stir in olive oil and Parmesan cheese; season to taste.

ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'packed fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': None, 'name': 'lemon juice, or more to taste (optional)'}

name: 15 Quick and Easy Dinners Loaded With Pesto
Simple Garlic and Basil Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'chopped fresh basil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'Brazil nuts'}, {'quantity': '⅔', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chili powder'}
steps: Place the basil in a blender. Pour in about 1 tablespoon of the oil, and blend basil into a paste. Gradually add pine nuts, Brazil nuts, Parmesan cheese, garlic, chili powder, and remaining oil. Continue to blend until smooth.

name: Homemade Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'packed fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'Italian parsley'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, peeled and lightly crushed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil, or more as needed'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Place basil, Italian parsley, and garlic into a food processor, pulse several times to combine, and process until basil is finely chopped, about 30 seconds. Add pine nuts to basil mixture; process until finely chopped, 30 more seconds. Process Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese into mixture until finely ground.. Mix lemon juice into mixture with the machine running; slowly drizzle olive oil into pesto in the running machine until incorporated and pesto is thoroughly combined. Turn off machine and season pesto to taste with salt and black pepper.

name: Easy Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'almonds'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Place almonds on a cookie sheet, and bake for 10 minutes, or until lightly toasted.. In a food processor, combine toasted almonds, garlic, basil, olive oil, nutmeg, salt and pepper. Process until a coarse paste is formed.

name: How to Make Pesto that Lasts (Practically) Forever
What Is Pesto and How Do You Make It At Home?
Jalapeno Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'walnuts'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'packed fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded Parmagiano-Reggiano cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'jalapeno pepper, stem removed'}, {'quantity': '⅔', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Pulse walnuts and garlic in a food processor until finely chopped. Add basil, Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, and jalapeno pepper; process until combined. Stream olive oil into basil mixture while food processor is still running until consistency is smooth. Season with salt and black pepper.

name: Spinach Walnut Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh baby spinach, stems removed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'freshly grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh parsley leaves, chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped walnuts'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}
steps: Place spinach, Parmesan cheese, parsley, walnuts, water, garlic, salt, and pepper in a food processor; blend until well combined. Pour in oil slowly, while processor is running, until mixture forms a smooth paste.

name: Fresh Basil Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'packed fresh basil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'toasted pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, peeled'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'freshly grated Pecorino Romano cheese'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Combine basil, oil, pine nuts, garlic, and lemon juice in a food processor or blender; purée until smooth. Stir in Pecorino Romano cheese, salt, and pepper.

name: Walnut Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'walnuts'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'lemon juice'}
steps: Blend basil, walnuts, olive oil, garlic, and lemon juice together in a food processor until pesto has a paste-like consistency.

name: Salsa di Noci
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'walnuts'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, peeled'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'sea salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh marjoram'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh thyme'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh oregano'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'heavy cream'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'finely grated Pecorino Romano cheese'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'sea salt to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(16 ounce) box', 'name': 'dry fettuccine pasta'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'fresh chives, finely chopped'}
steps: Bring water to a boil in a small saucepan. Add walnuts and cook until they have softened slightly, about 5 minutes. Drain and set aside.. Combine garlic and pinch sea salt in the bowl of a mortar and pestle. Grind to create a thick paste. Add walnuts, marjoram, thyme, and oregano. Grind until combined and slightly creamy, but still coarse.. Transfer the walnut mixture to a large bowl. Slowly whisk in olive oil to form a thick emulsion. Add heavy cream and Pecorino Romano cheese and whisk until combined. Season with black pepper and sea salt to taste.. Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil. Stir in fettuccine, return to a boil, and cook pasta over medium heat until cooked through but still firm to the bite, about 8 minutes. Drain.. Toss walnut sauce with pasta. Garnish with fresh chives.

name: Summer Herb Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'garlic cloves, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh flat-leaf parsley leaves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh spinach leaves'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh oregano'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'toasted pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}
steps: Blend garlic, basil, parsley, spinach, oregano, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, and olive oil in a blender or food processor until smooth.

name: Swiss Chard and Pecan Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil, divided'}, {'quantity': '10', 'unit': 'leaves', 'name': 'Swiss chard, chopped'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pecans'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'sea salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(3 ounce) package', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Heat 2 teaspoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir Swiss chard and garlic in hot oil until chard leaves have wilted, 3 to 5 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool.. Process basil, pecans, sea salt, Parmesan cheese, and remaining olive oil in a food processor until all the ingredients are well integrated. Add Swiss chard mixture and lemon juice to the food processor; continue pulsing until the mixture is puréed. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Easy Basil Pesto with Almonds
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'whole raw almonds'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil, or more as needed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, peeled'}
steps: Combine basil, Parmesan cheese, almonds, olive oil, and garlic in a food processor; pulse until blended. Pour in more olive oil, with the processor running, until pesto is thick and smooth.

name: Sunflower Seed and Basil Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'packed fresh basil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'packed fresh parsley'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'raw sunflower seeds'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'grated Pecorino Romano cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, crushed, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'sea salt, or to taste'}
steps: Combine basil, parsley, olive oil, sunflower seeds, Pecorino Romano cheese, lemon juice, garlic, and sea salt in a small blender or food processor; purée until blended to desired consistency. Taste and adjust salt if desired.

name: Basil Walnut Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'basil leaves (see "Keep it Green," below)'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'walnuts'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'Parmesan cheese, grated'}, {'quantity': '1/3', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}
steps: Combine basil, walnuts, Parmesan, oil, garlic, and salt in a food processor. Cover; process until nearly smooth. If needed, add water, a tablespoon at a time, to thin to desired consistency.. Transfer to a bowl; cover surface of pesto with plastic wrap. Chill up to 3 days.

name: Sun-Dried Tomato Pesto (No Nuts)
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sun-dried tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh basil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'shredded Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}
steps: Place sun-dried tomatoes in a small pot and cover with water; bring to a boil. Remove from heat and let tomatoes soften, about 10 minutes. Drain.. Blend tomatoes, basil, Parmesan cheese, garlic, and salt in a blender until mixed. Slowly add olive oil, about 1/4 cup at a time; blend until smooth.

name: Cilantro Jalapeno Pesto with Lime
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'toasted pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}
steps: Combine the cilantro, pine nuts, olive oil, garlic, lime juice, jalapeno pepper, and Parmesan cheese in a blender; pulse until the mixture reaches a soft, paste-like consistency.

name: Chive Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'large garlic chives'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'name': 'cream cheese'}
steps: Pulse garlic chives in the bowl of a food processor until finely chopped. Add fresh basil; pulse until finely chopped. Pour olive oil in slowly, with the processor running, until smooth. Add garlic powder, oregano, dried basil, salt, and black pepper; pulse until blended. Add cream cheese; pulse until blended.. Transfer pesto to a bowl; cover. Chill until flavors combine, about 15 minutes.

name: Basic Basil Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves, stems removed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}
steps: Place pine nuts in a single layer in a dry skillet over medium-low heat. Cook, stirring constantly, until fragrant and golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Transfer immediately to a plate to stop the cooking process; allow to cool, about 5 minutes.. Combine toasted pine nuts, basil, and garlic in the bowl of a food processor; pulse until blended. Pour olive oil in slowly, with the processor running on low speed, until mixture is smooth. Add Parmesan cheese and process until just combined.

name: Homemade Best-O Pesto Ever
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'almonds'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'loosely packed fresh basil'}, {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'olive oil, or more as needed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}
steps: Pulse pine nuts, almonds, and garlic in a food processor for about 20 seconds. Add basil, 1 cup olive oil, salt, and pepper. Blend for about 1 minute. Add additional olive oil until desired consistency is reached.

name: Rudy's Garlic Scape Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'garlic scapes, chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'freshly grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'freshly grated Asiago cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: Place the garlic scapes, Parmesan cheese, Asiago cheese, lemon juice, and pine nuts in the bowl of a food processor. Drizzle the olive oil over the mixture. Blend until the pesto is a brilliant green color and smooth in texture. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Chef John's Garlic Scape Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'roughly chopped garlic scapes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white wine vinegar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'kosher salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'canola oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'toasted walnuts'}
steps: Combine garlic scapes, lemon juice, vinegar, salt, olive oil, canola oil, and walnuts in a blender. Blend into a smooth paste. Adjust seasoning if needed.

name: Lighter Basil Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh basil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'part-skim ricotta cheese'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper, to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'vegetable broth, or as needed'}
steps: Chop basil, garlic, and pine nuts in a food processor. Add ricotta cheese to basil mixture and process. Repeat with Parmesan cheese, olive oil, salt, and black pepper. Add vegetable broth and process until sauce is smooth. Add more broth if pesto is too thick.

name: Thai Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'cilantro'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'peanut butter'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'minced fresh ginger'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fish sauce'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cayenne pepper'}
steps: Blend cilantro, peanut butter, garlic, olive oil, ginger, fish sauce, brown sugar, and cayenne pepper in a blender until smooth.

name: Pesto-Crusted Grouper
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(9 ounce)', 'name': 'grouper fillet'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'panko bread crumbs'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': "Greek seasoning (such as Cavender's®)"}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'pesto'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter'}
steps: Season grouper fillet with salt and pepper. Mix bread crumbs and Greek seasoning in a small bowl. Rub pesto over the grouper and top with bread crumbs.. Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat. Place fillet in the skillet and cook for 3 to 4 minutes. Carefully turn over and cook until fillet is cooked through, 3 to 4 minutes. Turn over once more, being careful to leave the panko breading in place. Split fillet in half for 2 servings.

name: Arugula Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'arugula leaves, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'raw almonds'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}
steps: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add arugula and cook until bright green, about 30 seconds. Remove arugula to a bowl full of ice water for several minutes until cold. Drain and wring out arugula.. Pulse arugula, olive oil, almonds, and garlic together in a blender, scraping down the sides, until mixture just becomes a coarse puree. Pour puree into a bowl and season with salt.

name: Creamy Pesto Sauce
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'cream cheese'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large clove', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}
steps: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add the basil leaves and cook until tender and bright green, 2 to 5 minutes. Drain basil, reserving 2 tablespoons of the basil water.. Blend basil, 2 tablespoons basil water, Parmesan cheese, cream cheese, olive oil, butter, and garlic in a blender until smooth and creamy.

name: Pesto alla Siciliana
ingredients: {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves, stems removed'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cherry tomatoes, seeded and diced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'ricotta cheese'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Combine Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, olive oil, basil leaves, pine nuts, and garlic in a mortar. Crush with a pestle until pesto is finely ground, but not too smooth.. Mix pesto, cherry tomatoes, and ricotta cheese together in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper.

name: The Best Classic Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'packed fresh basil leaves, washed and thoroughly dried'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pine nuts, lightly toasted'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'kosher salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'freshly grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'freshly squeezed lemon juice'}
steps: Pulse basil and garlic in a food processor about 8 times until finely chopped. Add toasted pine nuts and salt; turn processor on low and drizzle olive oil through the chute until everything is incorporated. Add Parmesan cheese and lemon juice; pulse 2 times.

name: 12 Pesto Dinners Ready in 30 Minutes or Less
Borage Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'borage leaves'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'pumpkin seeds'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'freshly grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil, plus more as needed'}
steps: Wash and dry borage leaves. Roast pumpkin seeds in a dry skillet until lightly browned, 2 to 4 minutes. Remove and allow to cool.. Combine borage leaves, roasted pumpkin seeds, Parmesan cheese, garlic, and salt in a food processor. With the food processor running, add olive oil, and process until a smooth paste forms. Transfer to a jar and add more olive oil to cover. Store in the refrigerator.

name: Easy Creamy Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'sour cream'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'pesto, or more to taste'}
steps: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir in heavy cream. Add flour and mix well to remove clumps. Season with salt and pepper.. Stir sour cream and pesto into the saucepan. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer, stirring, until flavors combine, 2 to 3 minutes more.

name: Pepita Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh parsley'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pepitas'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(2/3 ounce) package', 'name': 'fresh basil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}
steps: Combine parsley, pepitas, basil, lemon juice, water, and garlic salt in the bowl of a food processor; pulse until blended into a coarse meal. Pour olive oil in slowly and pulse a few times until pesto has come together.

name: Faux Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh baby spinach'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pecans'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}

name: Make Healthy Pesto Three Ways with this Basic Recipe Formula
Three Pepper Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '⅔', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped red bell pepper'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'tightly packed basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'red pepper flakes'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}

name: 15-Year-Old Pesto Sauce

name: 5 Arugula Pesto Recipes That Are Fresh and Flavorful
Pecan Parsley Pepper Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'flat leaf parsley with stems'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'shelled pecans'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'extra virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shaved Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '30', 'unit': '', 'name': 'pitted kalamata olives'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'jalapeno pepper, seeded'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced and zested'}
steps: Place the parsley, pecans, olive oil, Parmesan cheese, olives, jalapeno pepper, garlic, lemon juice, and lemon zest in the bowl of a blender or food processor, and pulse until smooth and creamy. Store in refrigerator.

name: Cacao Nib Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves, stems removed'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil, divided'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cocoa nibs'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'toasted pine nuts, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'pink peppercorns'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'sea salt'}
steps: Place basil leaves in a mini processor. Add 2 tablespoons oil, cacao nibs, 2 tablespoons pine nuts, lemon juice, peppercorns, and sea salt. Pulse until coarse. Add more oil if needed and blend into a creamy paste. Mix in remaining pine nuts.. Use pesto immediately or refrigerate in a glass container topped with oil to avoid browning.

name: Presto Vegan Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'fresh basil'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'Parmesan flavor grated soy topping'}
steps: Place the basil, pine nuts, garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, water, and soy topping into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth.

name: Trofie alla Genovese
ingredients: {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'chopped fresh basil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'vegetable stock, or more as needed'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'haricots verts'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'russet potato, cut into 1/2-inch cubes'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': '1 lb trofie pasta (preferably fresh)'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'wedges', 'name': 'fresh lemon'}
steps: Start by making the pesto: Heat a dry pan over medium-low heat. Add pine nuts and roast, tossing occasionally, until fragrant, 3 to 5 minutes. Transfer to a food processor.. Add basil, Parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup olive oil, and garlic to the pine nuts; pulse until pesto is smooth. Add more olive oil if pesto is too thick. Season with salt and pepper and let rest for 1 hour.. Prepare pasta: Bring vegetable stock to a boil in a large pot. Add haricots verts and boil for 5 minutes. Reduce heat to a simmer, add potato, and cook until both are fork-tender, about 20 minutes. Remove vegetables with a slotted spoon, leaving broth in the pot.. Add trofie pasta to the broth and boil until tender yet firm to the bite, 7 to 8 minutes for dry pasta and 3 to 4 minutes for fresh. Drain.. Combine potatoes, green beans, and pasta with the reserved pesto and toss together. Plate immediately with a wedge of lemon.

name: Easy Ramp Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ramps leaves, rinsed and dried'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, peeled and chopped'}, {'quantity': '10', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'finely grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}
steps: Combine ramp leaves, pine nuts, and garlic in a food processor. Process until finely chopped. With the food processor running, add olive oil and process everything until smooth. Transfer mixture to a bowl and mix in grated Parmesan cheese. Season with salt to taste.

name: Small Batch Dill Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'fresh dill, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'walnuts'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'freshly grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, zested and juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, peeled and quartered'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'red pepper flakes (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}
steps: Place dill fronds (a few stems are OK), walnuts, lemon juice, lemon zest, garlic, salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes into the bowl of a food processor. If you have a mini or small food processor, it will be large enough for this recipe.. Pulse until everything is minced well, scraping down the sides as necessary. With the machine running, drizzle in the olive oil, blending for a few seconds until smooth.. If not serving immediately, store the pesto in an airtight container and chill until ready to use.

name: Dill Pesto
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'sprigs', 'name': 'fresh dill'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'toasted pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh parsley'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large clove', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'freshly grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil, divided, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'lemon, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper, or to taste'}
steps: Combine leaves of dill sprig, pine nuts, parsley, garlic, and Parmesan cheese in a food processor. Pulse until completely combined, 2 to 3 minutes.. Add 1 tablespoon olive oil, a small squirt of lemon juice, 1/8 teaspoon salt, and 1/8 teaspoon pepper; pulse again.. Taste for seasonings. Add 1 more tablespoon olive oil and pulse again. Continue adding olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper until pesto has the desired flavor and consistency.

name: 14 Fresh Takes on Basic Homemade Pesto
